thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com
thread.title: Beth W

author: Beth W
title: Beth W
text: So i work for a large organization where I have to plan lunch meetings regularly. Sadly where we're located not many people are willing to deliver except when I use ezCater. They have a vast selection of people to chose from and when I have issues with any of my orders they are prompt with correcting it and have even given me credits back to my order. They are very good to deal with.
